name: frl-wb
description: Real-time collaborative whiteboard with Firebase and FastAPI

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.start:backend:dev: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.install:all: cd shared && npm install && cd ../frontend && yarn install
scripts.test:coverage: cd frontend && yarn test:coverage && cd ../backend && bash -c 'source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest --cov'
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && bash -c 'source .venv/bin/activate && flake8 app/ tests/'
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && bash -c 'source .venv/bin/activate && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/'
